p:
San Francisco is located approximately 200 miles from the San Joaquin River (or Central) Valley, where coccidioidomycosis is endemic. As such, during the previous 6Â years, our consult service had seen only 6 cases of disseminated coccidioidomycosis. We discovered that our unusually coincident cases represented an epidemic declared in late 2016.
1 In fact, more cases were diagnosed in 2016 than in any year since 1995.
2 Given that our patients hailed from the Central Valley, we surmised that we were experiencing a spillover effect from an epidemic triggered by heavy rainfalls.
